original_title: Amateur Transplants in The Black and White Menstrual Show
overview: 2007 DVD released by Amateur Transplants (Dr Adam Kay and Dr Suman Biswas), recorded at the New Players Theatre, London. The DVD is of a live recording consisting of songs from both their first two albums Fitness to Practice and Unfit to Practise, as well as a few extras.
tagline: Dr Adam Kay and Dr Suman Biswas reunited on stage
title: Amateur Transplants in The Black and White Menstrual Show
